description: OkHttp interceptor chain error - interceptor not calling chain.proceed() or calling multiple times.
prevention: Call chain.proceed() exactly once per request
examples: class MyInterceptor : Interceptor { override fun intercept(chain: Chain): Response { val request = chain.request().newBuilder().addHeader("X-Custom", "value").build(); return chain.proceed(request) } }
// Logging: class LoggingInterceptor : Interceptor { override fun intercept(chain: Chain) = chain.proceed(chain.request()).also { Log.d(TAG, "Response: ${it.code}") } }
